```{r}
# Importación de librerías
library(tidyverse)
library(openxlsx)
library(janitor)
```

# lectura de datos

```{r}
# Lectura de datos
df <- read.xlsx("bd_pruebas.xlsx") %>% 
  mutate(cedula = as.character(cedula))
  
df
```

# DEPURAMOS DUPLICADOS


```{r}
df %>% 
  get_dupes(cedula)
```


```{r}
df %>% 
  group_by(cedula) %>% 
  fill(everything(), .direction = "updown") %>% 
  fill(everything(), .direction = "downup") %>% 
  distinct(cedula, .keep_all = TRUE)
```
